about.server: 4X Lenovo M700-Small low energy servers (i5 6600, 12GB ram, 256GB SSD + 500GB for disaster recovery), Gigabit fiber optic connection and UPS for over 2 hours of power backup. #sustainable
about.company: Carden Pool is a premium staking pool to make your ADA's worth. We are two Single Pool Operators that created and actively improving this bare metal pool, with the aim to partecipate to a real network decentralization. The whole infrastructure stands out thanks to its meager power consumption of 55W/h! CRPL is a Carbon Neutral pool supplyed by renewable energy. Itâ€™s a mission driven pool where 10% of pool operator rewards will be devolved to ForestaMI project, with the aim to reforest the city of Milan and its region.
